importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: Kada Scott was last seen at her workplace on this date, marking the beginning of the investigation into her disappearance.
A man was arrested and charged with Scott’s kidnapping and a prior kidnapping case, indicating an escalation in law enforcement activity and potential pattern of criminal behavior.
The remains of an unidentified woman were found in a shallow grave, and a news conference was held to announce the discovery and update on the suspect's charges.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The investigation into Kada Scott’s disappearance began on October 4, when she was last seen at work, and progressed through the following weeks with key developments including a tip leading to the discovery of remains and the arrest of a suspect.

keyTakeAways: A 23-year-old Philadelphia woman, Kada Scott, went missing on October 4, 2025, after being last seen at her workplace.
Human remains believed to belong to Kada Scott were found in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school in a wooded area.
A man named Keon King, 21, was arrested and charged with Scott’s kidnapping, as well as a prior kidnapping case involving another woman.
Tracking phone communications led investigators to Keon King, who was the last person confirmed in contact with Scott before she disappeared.
The remains were discovered following a specific anonymous tip, indicating that public tips are critical to solving the case.
Police believe Scott may have been in a gold 1999 Toyota Camry linked to King, which was later found in an apartment complex parking lot.
King previously faced charges in a domestic kidnapping case from earlier this year, which were withdrawn in May but refiled due to a witness failure to appear.
The Philadelphia Police Department and FBI’s Violent Crime Task Force are jointly investigating the case, suggesting a serious and coordinated effort.
Scott’s family has expressed deep concern, urging the public to come forward with any information, emphasizing that small details could be pivotal.
The case is being examined for a possible pattern of behavior, with authorities emphasizing that King’s actions may indicate a broader criminal pattern.

namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: She is the central figure in the disappearance case, and the discovery of her remains has significantly advanced the investigation.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A 23-year-old Philadelphia woman, Kada Scott, disappeared on October 4, 2025, after being last seen at her workplace. Two weeks later, human remains believed to belong to her were discovered in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school, following a specific anonymous tip. Police have arrested 21-year-old Keon King, who was last in contact with Scott and has a prior criminal record involving a domestic kidnapping case. Investigators believe Scott may have been in a gold 1999 Toyota Camry linked to King, which was later found in an apartment complex. The case is being investigated by the Philadelphia Police Department and the FBI’s Violent Crime Task Force, with officials highlighting a possible pattern of behavior. Scott’s family has urged the public to come forward with any information, emphasizing that even small details could be crucial to solving the case.
title: Police Investigating Disappearance of Philadelphia Woman Say Tip Led Them to Shallow Grave with Remains
